comment: Main text block with vertical columns of Chinese characters, framed by a thick black border. The text is arranged in traditional right-to-left, top-to-bottom format. Contains entries for characters such as '影', '斌', '藝', '著', '野', '裘', '隤' with explanations, etymologies, and phonetic notes. Marginalia on the left includes page numbers ('大四', '先二十五下') and other annotations ('嚴振').
